description.originalText: Pamela was great with your baby girl. As a first time mom I felt extremely comfortable leaving her with Pamela when I went back to work. She also offered us lots of great advice as well. I am thankful for our time with her!

Pamela is loving, gregarious, and funny and she quickly became a part of our family. We hired her as a nanny for our 4 mo daughter and she was with us for about a year, until our little one started daycare. We would do it again without hesitation. Our daughter (and our cat) loved her and we trusted Pamela completely with her care. Pamela is highly experienced in caring for children and we on many occasions relied on her no-nonsense, practical advice. This was truly helpful to us as first-time parents since it is easy to get lost in an infinite sea of baby-related information and products. Pamela has over time performed many thoughtful acts of kindness (e.g., sharing her delicious cooking and small gifts with our daughter) and remains a dear friend of the family. We highly recommend her to your family.

description.displayText: I highly recommend Pamela. As a first time mom I was apprehensive about leaving my one month old with a stranger, but Pamela soon became my daughter's best friend. Pamela has been with my family for 8 months now but will sadly soon have to part ways once my daughter starts daycare. Pamela will listen to your preferences on how to take care of baby and respect them. She is, as one other reviewer said, the baby whisperer. Before I sleep trained my baby, Pamela was the only one able to get her down for her naps without a fuss! It's adorable to watch my daughter greet Pamela in the morning - proof of how loving and caring Pamela is to the kids she looks after.

description.displayText: Excellent with our infant - she worked for us for about a year.  She has a wealth of knowledge and became CPR certified for us. She is the baby whisperer and can get an irritable baby to sleep with ease.  She also fosters independence and development of milestones.  She also introduces a variety of foods to broaden a baby's palate.
description.originalText: Excellent with our infant - she worked for us for about a year.  She has a wealth of knowledge and became CPR certified for us. She is the baby whisperer and can get an irritable baby to sleep with ease.  She also fosters independence and development of milestones.  She also introduces a variety of foods to broaden a baby's palate.

description.displayText: Pamela was a God-send to our family.  We happily had her as our daughter's beloved nanny from the day I went back to work until LO was just over 3 years old.  I was dragging my feet on sending our LO to preschool despite knowing she would love being around all the other kids (she is super social!) because I loved not only the convenience of having Pamela come to our house but enjoyed seeing her and chatting with her myself.  She has been like a big sister/fun aunt to me as a new mom.  I respect her as a nanny and a person--she has great experience raising her own kids and being a long-time nanny.  But she is very energetic and fit and could keep up with our toddler as well as I can.  She is the kind of person I am so glad our child got to spend a lot of time around--she provided an amazingly rich, educated environment for our child that has given her a great foundation for life!  She's like family now and LO still talks about her all the time ("I love Pama" just yesterday!)

description.displayText: Pamela was a wonderful many to my newborn son. If he wasn't sleeping, she was holding him, talking to him, singing to him softly. I always felt confident that my baby was being cared for and nurtured. Pamela is also a great communicator, and let me know how the day was going. I highly recommend her!
description.originalText: Pamela was a wonderful many to my newborn son. If he wasn't sleeping, she was holding him, talking to him, singing to him softly. I always felt confident that my baby was being cared for and nurtured. Pamela is also a great communicator, and let me know how the day was going. I highly recommend her!

description.displayText: Pamela is wonderful with children.  She has taken care of my children since most of them were born.  She is kind, patient, loving, and so much more.  I highly recommend Pamela!
description.originalText: Pamela is wonderful with children.  She has taken care of my children since most of them were born.  She is kind, patient, loving, and so much more.  I highly recommend Pamela!

description.displayText: Pamela is the parent of children at a private school at which I work. She and I have had many interactions reaching back nearly a decade. She works in the classrooms with the children as an assistant to the teachers, and has a wonderful way with the children. Her personality and character exude caring, gentleness and concern for others. In addition, I have had occasion to speak with people for whose children Pamela has provided in-home care, and they have all spoken very highly of her in that context.
